attributes.action: Raise awareness of stillbirths and help reduce them!
attributes.additional_details:
To raise awareness of stillbirths and neonatal deaths,
And to start getting research into this to try reduce the numbers.Each year in the UK over 6,500 babies die just before, during or soon after birth.  That’s 17 babies every day.

This rate has risen over the past few years,and we want this to come down not go up, no parents should go through this trauma and have to deal on there own.

We want change.
